title: AG60140: Crop Process Equipment Design - Quick Facts
text:
AG60140
Course name | Crop Process Equipment Design
Offered by | Agricultural & Food Engineering
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Design of machine elements and their selection. Design of grains and other crops processing machine components. Grain/crop processing systems design involving, conveying, elevating, cleaning, separation, conditioning/parboiling, milling and mixing. Design, laying and drawing of crop processing machines and plants.
